page.title: 09The Church (continued)
page.content: The pews are carved with a 'poppyhead' design, reflecting the link with the fields surrounding the village. Today, the church still plays a leading role in the life of the community. The Rector, as well as conducting a range of services in the church including a Family Service once a month, contributes articles to the village Newsletter which is published once a month. Sunday School meets twice a month and the church organises an annual Fete which takes place in July. The church is also used as a display area for organisations which incorporate both the Christian and social aspects of the village life.
